author: Julie Bastow Daly
content: Hired the disco dome, always hired by other companies in past but this was fantastic as the music came with their own usb stick with 200 latest songs which saved alot of hassle having to sort it out myself!!!  plus the ones I've hired before had velcro doors which was a problem when they kept coming off as it would go down...this one was alot better as the door was open... Really pleased & will deffinately be using again Thankyou
